professionalSummary: Frontend Developer skilled in Angular, the MERN Stack, Next.js, and React.js, with expertise in building responsive, scalable user interfaces, version control using Git/GitHub, and deploying production-ready web applications using Vercel and Render.

workExperience.title: Junior Software Engineer (Intern)
workExperience.company: Cwayita Technologies India Pvt. Ltd., Pune
responsibilities: Built and deployed production-ready web applications using Angular, Next.js (App Router), and React.js with SSR, SSG, and ISR.
Developed responsive, accessible, and pixel-perfect UIs using Angular templates, JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and SCSS.
Implemented clean and scalable frontend architecture using Angular components, services, and modular structure along with Redux and Context API.
Integrated authentication and authorization using JWT and NextAuth, including protected routes and role-based access control.
Consumed RESTful APIs using Angular HttpClient, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB with proper error handling and data management.
Used Git and GitHub for version control, collaboration, branching, and code reviews following SDLC practices.
Configured CI/CD pipelines and deployed applications using Vercel, Render, and basic Angular build processes.

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an admin dashboard using Next.js (App Router) with SSR for performance and SEO. Implemented user authentication with NextAuth including secure login and registration with Google Login. Built responsive UI with React.js and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Trusted Simple Line
projects.description: Developed an IT services management platform featuring secure Google authentication for user login and registration. Built an HR module to manage employee data and send emails efficiently. Implemented full CRUD operations for employee records using Express.js and MongoDB. Designed a fully responsive and clean user interface using React.js and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: CNG-Simple-Line
projects.description: Developed a CNG booking management system using the MERN stack with secure role-based access. Implemented JWT authentication and custom middleware for user and admin roles. Designed a fully responsive and user-friendly UI using React.js and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: IT Books Management
projects.description: Built a web app and app to manage and generate IT-related books using Node.js and Gemini AI. Integrated Gemini AI to generate and enhance IT book content dynamically based on user input. Implemented complete CRUD functionality for employee records using Express.js and MongoDB. Designed a responsive UI using React.js and Tailwind CSS.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) in Computer Science

certificationsAchievements.title: Internship Certificate
certificationsAchievements.issuer: Cravita Technologies India Pvt. Ltd. (May Oct 2025)
